# discord-attachment



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute              | Description                                                                                                                                                           | Type             | Default                |
| -------------------- | ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------- |
| `alt`                | `alt`                  | The alt text to show in case the image was unable to load                                                                                                             | `string`         | `'discord attachment'` |
| `height`             | `height`               | The height of the image in pixels                                                                                                                                     | `number`         | `undefined`            |
| `heightModifierSize` | `height-modifier-size` | The max size at which the height will be modified to be only 20% of the total given amount If you would like to disable resizing of the image then set this to `null` | `null \| number` | `200`                  |
| `url`                | `url`                  | The URL for the image attachment                                                                                                                                      | `string`         | `undefined`            |
| `width`              | `width`                | The width of the image in pixels                                                                                                                                      | `number`         | `undefined`            |
| `widthModifierSize`  | `width-modifier-size`  | The max size at which the width will be modified to be only 20% of the total given amount If you would like to disable resizing of the image then set this to `null`  | `null \| number` | `200`                  |
